title: The First Emperor Said He Likes Me - Novel Updates
tags: College/University   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Futanari   Ghosts   Mpreg   Mysterious Family Background   Older Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Straight Seme   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters
author: The Way Back   路归途
description:
Wen Yu has a secret.

He is a hermaphrodite.

One night, he felt someone touching him.

Wen Yu soon fell in love with the man who was domineering and cared for him. However, he never thought that the other side only thought that he was a son and was gentle to him, but didn’t belong to him.>
